name: Swallowed Penny
description: Spawns one coin of any type upon taking damage.

name: Petrified Poop
description: Increases pickup drop rate from poops to 50%.

name: AAA Battery
description: If an activated item would regain its second to last charge upon clearing a room, it is instead fully charged. This effectively reduces its charge time by one bar.

name: Broken Remote
description: Triggers the Teleport! effect whenever an activated item is used.

name: Purple Heart
description: Doubles the chance for champion enemies to appear.

name: Broken Magnet
description: Pulls all types of coins towards Isaac. Ignores all other pickups.

name: Rosary Bead
description: Increases the chance to have an Angel Room replace a Devil Room, from 50% (base chance) to 75%.

name: Cartridge
description: Grants about a 5% base chance to trigger The Gamekid effect upon taking damage.

name: Pulse Worm
description: Tears pulsate in size between 1x to 1.6x as they travel. The effect changes the hitbox of the tear but does not affect damage.

name: Wiggle Worm
description: Isaac's tears travel in a wave-like pattern.

name: Ring Worm
description: Isaac's tears travel in a high-speed spiral pattern.

name: Flat Worm
description: Makes Isaac's tears 50% wider, giving them an oblong appearance.

name: Store Credit
description: While holding the trinket, all items in the Shop are free.

name: Callus
description: Prevents damage from creep and floor spikes.

name: Lucky Rock
description: Rocks and their variants drop 1 Penny when destroyed.

name: Mom's Toenail
description: Mom's foot periodically comes down, dealing 300 damage.

name: Black Lipstick
description: Doubles the chance of Black Hearts appearing.

name: Bible Tract
description: Increases the chance of Eternal Hearts appearing.

name: Paper Clip
description: Allows Isaac to unlock Locked Chests without using Keys.

name: Monkey Paw
description: If Isaac has half a heart or less after taking damage, this trinket drops a Black Heart.

name: Mysterious Paper
description: On every frame, it has a random chance to grant the effect of one of the following items/trinkets:

name: Daemon's Tail
description: 80% of heart drops are replaced with Keys.

name: Missing Poster
description: If Isaac dies to a Sacrifice Room's spikes, a puzzle piece will appear on his last will.

name: Butt Penny
description: Upon picking up a coin, Isaac farts, knocking back nearby enemies  and projectiles.

name: Mysterious Candy
description: Isaac has a chance to fart or poop every 30 seconds.  Getting hit can also trigger the effect.

name: Hook Worm
description: Tears move shifting left to right on a square-wave-like path.

name: Whip Worm
description: Increases Shot Speed by 0.5.

name: Broken Ankh
description: When held, Isaac has a 22.22% chance to be revived as ??? in the previous room. Can occur multiple times in the same run.

name: Fish Head
description: Spawns a Blue Fly every time Isaac takes damage.

name: Pinky Eye
description: Adds a chance to shoot a poison tear, dealing damage over time when inflicted

name: Push Pin
description: Adds a chance to shoot a piercing and spectral tear.

name: Liberty Cap
description: If the Compass effect triggers while having the Treasure Map, the Compass effect is permanent for the remainder of the floor. (Other Mushroom effects will still apply in each room with their normal odds.)

name: Umbilical Cord
description: When Isaac's health is brought down to half a red heart and no soul hearts, a Little Steven familiar spawns for the current room.

name: Child's Heart
description: Gives a 10% chance of changing the room drop reward to a Heart.

name: Curved Horn
description: +2 flat damage.

name: Rusted Key
description: Gives a 10% chance of changing the room drop reward to a Key.

name: Goat Hoof
description: +0.15 speed.

name: Mom's Pearl
description: Grants a 10% chance of any non-specific heart drop turning into a Soul Heart.

name: Cancer (Trinket)
description: -2 tear delay (increased rate of fire)

name: Red Patch
description: Grants about a 20% chance of increasing damage by 1.8 for the current room upon taking damage.

name: Match Stick
description: Gives a 10% chance of changing the room drop reward to a Bomb.

name: Lucky Toe
description: +1 Luck.

name: Cursed Skull
description: If Isaac has less than one full Red Heart after taking damage, he will be immediately teleported to a random room.

name: Safety Cap
description: Gives a 10% chance of changing the room drop reward to a pill.

name: Ace of Spades
description: Gives a 10% chance of changing the room drop reward to a tarot or playing card.

name: Isaac's Fork
description: Grants a chance of being healed for a Half Red Heart upon clearing a room.

name: A Missing Page
description: Adds +40 damage to The Necronomicon and similar effects, such as Black Hearts.

name: Bloody Penny
description: Gives a chance to drop a Half Red Heart when money is collected.

name: Burnt Penny
description: Gives a chance to drop a Bomb when money is collected.

name: Flat Penny
description: Gives a chance of spawning a Key upon collecting any coin.

name: Counterfeit Penny
description: Gives a chance, upon picking up a coin, to increase the value of that coin by 1.

name: Tick
description: Removes 15% of any enemy's health if they have 60 HP or higher.

name: Isaac's Head
description: Isaac's severed head will follow him as a familiar firing piercing tears that deal 3.5 damage with each shot.

name: Maggy's Faith
description: Gives an Eternal Heart at the start of every floor.

name: Judas' Tongue
description: Items in the Devil Room only cost 1 heart container.

name: ???'s Soul
description: Spawns a familiar that floats slowly around the room on a zig-zag pattern similar to The Peeper and fires spectral and homing tears that deal 3.5 damage.

name: Samson's Lock
description: 1/15 chance to increase damage by 0.5 for the current room each time an enemy dies.

name: Cain's Eye
description: When starting a floor, 25% chance to gain the effect of The Compass for the duration of the floor.

name: Eve's Bird Foot
description: Chance to spawn up to 1 Dead Bird familiar for the current room each time an enemy dies.

name: The Left Hand
description: Replaces all types of Chests with Red Chests.

name: Shiny Rock
description: Tinted rocks and rocks with Crawl Spaces underneath flash white upon entering the room and every 10 seconds afterward.

name: Safety Scissors
description: Troll Bombs turn into Bomb pickups before they explode.

name: Rainbow Worm
description: Isaac's tears gain a worm trinket effect that changes every 3 seconds of the in-game timer. The effects include:

name: Tape Worm
description: x2 range.

name: Lazy Worm
description: -0.5 shot speed.

name: Cracked Dice
description: Upon taking damage, randomly activates one of the following dice's effect:

name: Super Magnet
description: Pickups and enemies are attracted to Isaac.

name: Faded Polaroid
description: Occasionally causes Isaac to blend into the ground, which briefly confuses all enemies in the room.

name: Louse
description: Occasionally spawns a Blue Spider.

name: Bob's Bladder
description: Bombs leave green creep underneath themselves.

name: Watch Battery
description: Increases the chance of a Lil' Battery pickup after clearing a room by 6.67%.

name: Blasting Cap
description: Upon exploding, Bomb have a 10% chance to drop a Bomb pickup.

name: Stud Finder
description: When a rock is destroyed, there is an additional 1 in 200 chance for a Crawl Space to spawn.

name: Error
description: Gives a random trinket effect for each room.

name: Poker Chip
description: If a Chest would contain Hearts, Coins, Bombs, or Keys and pills, cards, or runes(for  Wooden Chests), it has a 50/50 chance to either drop extra consumables or replace all of its contents with an Attack Fly.

name: Blister
description: Increases the knockback of Isaac's tears.

name: Second Hand
description: Increases the time that status effects stay on enemies.

name: Endless Nameless
description: When Isaac uses a consumable pickup like a pill or card, there is a 25% chance to spawn another copy of it.

name: Black Feather
description: Increases Isaac's Damage by +0.2 for each of the following items or trinkets he possesses:

name: Blind Rage
description: Doubles the invincibility frames Isaac gets after getting hit.

name: Golden Horse Shoe
description: +15% chance for a Treasure Room with two items to spawn on subsequent floors.

name: Store Key
description: Shop can be opened without using Keys.

name: Rib of Greed
description: Prevents Greed and Super Greed from appearing in Shop and Secret Room.

name: Karma
description: Donating to a Donation Machine has a chance to do one of the following:

name: Lil Larva
description: Spawns one Blue Fly from every Poop Isaac destroys.

name: Mom's Locket
description: Grants a Half Red Heart each time a Key is used to unlock a door, Locked Chest, or key block.

name: NO!
description: Prevents activated collectibles from being generated, if possible, from all item pools while this trinket is being held.

name: Child Leash
description: Causes Isaac's familiars to stay closer to Isaac.

name: Brown Cap
description: Destroying Poops causes them to explode, dealing  60 /  100 damage like a normal bomb, but with a shorter range.

name: Meconium
description: Adds a chance for Poop to turn into Black Poop.

name: Cracked Crown
description: -20% tear delay (increased rate of fire)

name: Used Diaper
description: Grants the Skatole effect with a 15% chance. This chance is seeded into each room and isn't affected by Luck.

name: Fish Tail
description: Many items and trinkets that generate Blue Flies or Locusts will generate twice as many.

name: Black Tooth
description: Adds a chance to fire a black tooth that poisons enemies.

name: Ouroboros Worm
description: Tears travel in a large spiral pattern.

name: Tonsil
description: After taking 12-20 hits, a removed tonsil familiar starts following Isaac, blocking enemy shots.

name: Nose Goblin
description: Adds a 10% chance to fire a booger tear that stick to the first enemy that they come in contact with and deals damage over time.

name: Super Ball
description: Adds a chance to fire tears that bounce off of enemies and obstacles.

name: Vibrant Bulb
description: Increases all stats while Isaac's active item is fully charged:

name: Dim Bulb
description: Increases all stats while Isaac's active item is completely uncharged:

name: Fragmented Card
description: Adds an extra Secret Room to all floors generated while holding the trinket.

name: Equality!
description: All pickups on the ground become their doubled variants as long as Isaac's held pickups are all the same number, e.g. 65 pennies, 65 bombs, 65 keys.

name: Wish Bone
description: Taking damage has a 2% chance to destroy the trinket and spawn a random item using the item pool of the current room.

name: Bag Lunch
description: Taking damage has a 2% chance to destroy the trinket and spawn Lunch.

name: Lost Cork
description: Increases the radius of all creep produced by Isaac and his familiars.

name: Crow Heart
description: Red Heart damage will be taken before Soul Heart, Black Heart, and  Rotten Heart damage.

name: Walnut
description: Being hit with explosion has a 33% chance to destroy the trinket and spawn a Coin, a Heart, a Key and another trinket. The pickups may be of any normal variety.

name: Duct Tape
description: Familiars that are bound to Isaac's movement will be stuck in place relative to his position.

name: Silver Dollar
description: Shops appear in the Womb, Utero, and Scarred Womb.

name: Bloody Crown
description: Treasure Rooms appear in the Womb, Utero, and Scarred Womb.

name: Pay to Win
description: A Shop Restock Machine always spawns in Treasure Rooms.

name: Locust of War
description: Upon entering a room with enemies for the first time, spawns a Red Locust which detonates upon impact with enemies, dealing double tear damage for the impact of the Locust and 60 damage for the explosion.

name: Locust of Pestilence
description: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Green Locust that deals double Isaac's damage and poisons enemies, which deals double Isaac's damage over time.

name: Locust of Famine
description: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Yellow Locust that deals double Isaac's damage and slows enemies.

name: Locust of Death
description: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Black Locust that deals quadruple Isaac's damage, applied as two hits of double damage.

name: Locust of Conquest
description: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns 1-4 White Locusts that deal double Isaac's damage.

name: Bat Wing
description: Upon killing an enemy, has a chance to grant flight for the rest of the room.

name: Stem Cell
description: Heals for a Half Red Heart upon traveling to the next floor.

name: Hairpin
description: Fully recharges Isaac's active item upon entering a boss fight.

name: Wooden Cross
description: Grants a shield which nullifies a single hit once per floor.

name: Butter!
description: Using an active item will drop it onto a pedestal on the ground.

name: Filigree Feather
description: Angels drop items from the Angel Room item pool instead of key pieces when defeated.

name: Door Stop
description: While held, the last door Isaac went through stays open, allowing him to leave the room even if enemies are in it.

name: Extension Cord
description: Bolts of electricity arc between Isaac and his familiars, damaging any enemies between them.

name: Rotten Penny
description: Spawns a Blue Fly every time a coin is picked up.

name: Baby-Bender
description: Grants Isaac's familiars homing shots.

name: Finger Bone
description: Grants a 2%[1] chance to gain a Bone Heart upon taking damage.

name: Jawbreaker
description: Adds a chance to shoot a tooth instead of a tear, which deals x3.2 Isaac's damage; mechanically identical to the passive item Tough Love.

name: Chewed Pen
description: Adds a chance to fire tears that slow enemies.

name: Blessed Penny
description: Gives a chance to drop a Half Soul Heart when money is collected. The chance is based on the coin's worth:[1]

name: Broken Syringe
description: When Isaac enters a new room, has a chance to give the effect of any syringe for the current room.

name: Short Fuse
description: Bombs placed by Isaac explode in 0.66 seconds instead of 1.5 seconds.

name: Gigante Bean
description: Makes farts (e.g. Butter Bean) significantly larger.

name: A Lighter
description: Has a chance to inflict burning on enemies upon entering a new room.

name: Broken Padlock
description: Doors that require a Key, Penny, or a Heart can be opened with explosions.

name: Myosotis
description: Spawns pickups left on the previous floor in the starting room of the current floor.

name: 'M
description: Using an active item rerolls it into a different active item.

name: Teardrop Charm
description: Luck-based tear effects (i.e. status-inflicting tears or other effects, such as Euthanasia) have a higher chance of occurring.

name: Apple of Sodom
description: Picking up a Red Heart has a 50% chance to consume the heart and spawn Blue Spiders, causing a fart similar to Butt Penny.

name: Forgotten Lullaby
description: Doubles the rate of fire of Isaac's familiars.

name: Beth's Faith
description: At the beginning of each floor, spawn 4 wisps that orbit Isaac and fire tears alongside him. The wisps are the same as the default wisps that spawn with Book of Virtues.

name: Old Capacitor
description: Active items don't charge when clearing rooms. Adds a high chance to spawn a Lil' Battery when clearing a room, independent of the room's original drop.

name: Brain Worm
description: Tears snap 90 degrees to target enemies that they may have missed.

name: Perfection
description: Gives +10 luck.

name: Devil's Crown
description: Every Treasure Room is replaced with a Devil Treasure Room that contain items from the Devil Room item pool that can be bought for the usual number of Heart Containers normally requested (for the spawned item) in a Devil Room.

name: Charged Penny
description: Picking up coins has a chance to add one charge to Isaac's currently held Active Item.

name: Friendship Necklace
description: Familiars that normally follow Isaac orbit around him instead.

name: Panic Button
description: Activates Isaac's active item just before damage would be taken.

name: Blue Key
description: Entering a room that requires a Key does not consume a key, but brings Isaac to a room resembling ???, which acts as an in-between of the two rooms.

name: Flat File
description: Makes all spikes retract, preventing them from dealing damage.

name: Telescope Lens
description: Raises the default chance for a Planetarium to spawn from 1% to 10%.

name: Mom's Lock
description: Has a chance to grant the effects of a random passive Mom item each room.

name: Dice Bag
description: Has a 50% chance to give Isaac a one-time use Dice item in a consumable slot when he enters a new room. The die disappears when he leaves the room, and cannot be dropped.

name: Holy Crown
description: Causes a Treasure Room and Shop to generate in Cathedral.

name: Mother's Kiss
description: Grants one heart container while held.

name: Torn Card
description: Every 15 shots, Isaac will shoot an Ipecac + My Reflection tear with a very high range value.

name: Torn Pocket
description: Upon taking damage, Isaac drops 2 random Pickups from his inventory (except Hearts, Pills, or Cards).

name: Gilded Key
description: Replaces all new chests with Golden Chests.

name: Lucky Sack
description: Spawns a Grab Bag upon traveling to the next floor.

name: Wicked Crown
description: Causes a Treasure Room and Shop to generate in Sheol.

name: Azazel's Stump
description: Gives Isaac a chance to visually turn into Azazel when clearing a room. Isaac keeps his hearts and items, but changes his tears to be a short range Brimstone, grants a x1.5 damage multiplier and gains the ability to fly.

name: Dingle Berry
description: Spawns a random friendly Dip upon clearing a room.

name: Ring Cap
description: Places one extra Bomb for each bomb placed free of charge.

name: Nuh Uh!
description: On Chapter 4 and beyond, replaces all coin and Key spawns with a random pickup from the table below.

name: Modeling Clay
description: Has a 50% chance to mimic the effect of a random passive item from the current room’s item pool when entering a room.

name: Polished Bone
description: After clearing a room, adds a chance to spawn a friendly Bony.

name: Hollow Heart
description: Grants one Bone Heart container upon entering a new floor.

name: Kid's Drawing
description: While held, acts as one of the three items needed for Guppy.

name: Crystal Key
description: Whenever Isaac clears a room, has a chance to open a neighboring Red Room.

name: Keeper's Bargain
description: Adds a chance for Devil Deals, Black Markets, and A Pound of Flesh Shop items to cost money instead of health.

name: Cursed Penny
description: Teleports Isaac to a random room upon picking up a coin.

name: Your Soul
description: Grants 1 free Devil Deal item in exchange for the trinket.

name: Number Magnet
description: Increases Devil Room chance by 10%.

name: Strange Key
description: Unlocks the passageway to ???, regardless of run duration.

name: Lil Clot
description: Spawns a Sumptorium blood clot Familiar on the ground next to Isaac. This familiar moves and shoots through the same inputs as Isaac, effectively acting as a second source of tears.

name: Temporary Tattoo
description: Drops a Chest after clearing a Challenge Room, or an extra Boss item after clearing a Boss Challenge Room.

name: Swallowed M80
description: Isaac has a 50% chance to explode when he takes damage, similarly to if he used Kamikaze!.

name: RC Remote
description: Instead of trailing behind Isaac, familiars are directly controlled by the same inputs as Isaac's.

name: Found Soul
description: Summons a Familiar that follows Isaac's exact movements, akin to Jacob and Esau, that flies and shoots spectral tears.

name: Expansion Pack
description: Upon use of an activated item, activates the effect of another random activated item.

name: Beth's Essence
description: Upon entering an Angel Room, spawns 5 wisp orbitals.

name: The Twins
description: Adds a 50% chance to duplicate one of Isaac's familiars when entering a new room.

name: Adoption Papers
description: Shops and Black Markets now sell familiars instead of the usual item selection.

name: Cricket Leg
description: Has a chance to spawn a random locust when killing an enemy.

name: Apollyon's Best Friend
description: Spawns an attack locust familiar identical to the default ones spawned by Abyss. It will fly forward while Isaac is shooting and deals contact damage equal to Isaac's damage.

name: Broken Glasses
description: 50% chance of adding an extra blind item in Treasure Room.

name: Ice Cube
description: Upon entering a room, each enemy has a 20% chance to be petrified. Enemies that have been petrified by Ice Cube are frozen when killed, including those killed up to 2 seconds after the petrification effect ends.

name: Sigil of Baphomet
description: Shields Isaac for 1 second after killing an enemy.
